biography: Keiko Kamitani (神谷 けいこ, Kamitani Keiko -real name spelled as 神谷 桂子), born February 13th, 1971 in Osaka, is a seiyū (Japanese voice actor). She was affiliated with J Productions until 2007 when she signed with Ricomotion. She is sometimes called by SNK to perform character image songs at SNK's special events.[1] She was also one of the main hosts to the now defunct radio program, Neo Chupi.
name: Keiko Kamitani
